definitions.definition: On the current day or date .
examples: Today , my brother went to the shops.

definitions.definition: In the current era ; nowadays ; these days .
examples: In the 1500s, people had to do things by hand, but today we have electric can openers.

definitions.definition: The day of a recurring cycle or event which is currently happening.
examples: We used to prepare everything today , but now we split it over two days.

main_definition: On the current day or date .
secondary_definitions: In the current era ; nowadays ; these days .
( informal ) The day of a recurring cycle or event which is currently happening.
